data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hui, T. Y., Wong, Kingsley J. H. (2019): Tropical sand-bubblers heading north? First discovery of Scopimera curtelsona Shen, 1936 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Dotillidae) populations in Hong Kong: possible range expansion from Hainan, China. Zootaxa 4652 (3): 520-532, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4652.3.8|7 occurrences
